item.title: Battlefield 6 Has More Bad News for Some Users
item.description:
EA has bad news for fans hoping to play Battlefield 6 on the Switch 2, as the publisher has confirmed it has no plans to release on Nintendo's latest console and will only be available on PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X/S, and PC. Although Nintendo's newest console has some significant hardware improvements over its predecessor, it looks like EA intends to give fans the best possible experience, as Battlefield 6 will only release on the most powerful platforms available.

Prior to yesterday's massive multiplayer reveal, EA shared the disappointing news that Battlefield 6 will not release on PlayStation 4 and Xbox One. Despite the fact that the last-gen consoles are now well over a decade old, many publishers are insisting on releasing new titles on the ageing hardware. For example, the next entry in the Call of Duty franchise, Black Ops 7 , will once again be available on the PlayStation 4 and Xbox One. So, many fans were left surprised when EA announced that it would not be supporting the last generation consoles for Battlefield 6 . Now, just one week later, the studio has confirmed it won't be releasing the shooter on yet another platform.

Alongside the game's multiplayer reveal on July 31, EA confirmed that Battlefield 6 will only be launching on PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X/S, and PC, which means a Nintendo Switch 2 release is currently not on the table. Given that Battlefield 6 looks like it's going to be one of the most graphically intense games on the market, this isn't much of a surprise. But, with that being said, the Nintendo Switch 2 has some big improvements over its predecessor, including a custom Nvidia Tegra T239 CPU, a much more powerful GPU capable of ray tracing and DLSS support, 12 GB of LPDDR5X RAM, and more. Unfortunately, it looks like the hardware upgrades still weren't enough to convince EA to launch Battlefield 6 on the Nintendo Switch 2.

Battlefield 6 Won't Release on Nintendo Switch 2

The Nintendo Switch 2 has been on the market for almost two months now, and while it won't be receiving Battlefield 6 at launch, there are already some big AAA titles available on the platform. As expected, the Switch 2 launched with some big Nintendo exclusives, such as Mario Kart World and a plethora of upgrades for existing Switch titles, like The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild . However, fans were left shocked when the studio announced that games such as Wild Hearts and Cyberpunk 2077 will also be available on the Nintendo Switch 2. While the console does feature some significant hardware upgrades, Cyberpunk 2077 has some incredible visuals that many expected to be impossible to optimize for a handheld device.

While fans won't be going hands-on with Battlefield 6 on the Nintendo Switch 2 anytime soon, there are only days left to go until EA launches the shooter's first open beta. Alongside the recent multiplayer reveal, the publisher confirmed the full list of open beta dates for Battlefield 6 . Those looking to jump in straight away will need a special code that can be obtained via Twitch Drops in order to receive early access from August 7 to 8. There will then be two open beta weekends for everyone to jump in (even without a pre-order) from August 9 to 10 and then from August 14 to 17.

Untitled Boxing Game Tips and Tricks

  4. Adjust tactics for the specific fight style selected.
  5. Use strong punches to break the shield.

Untitled Boxing Game was developed by a single developer called Drowningsome. But so far, this is the only game he has created, so fans are waiting for new projects.

item.title: 16 Years Later, Assassin's Creed Still Needs to Make Good on an AC2 Promise
item.description:
The hype around Assassin’s Creed Shadows has well and truly settled, which is why fans are reminiscing over older titles in Ubisoft’s franchise, and how one Assassin’s Creed 2 promise has never been fulfilled. Assassin’s Creed 2 was released all the way back in 2009, serving as a direct sequel to the first 2007 game. Launched on the PlayStation 3 and Xbox 360, AC2 follows Desmond Miles, who relives genetic memories of his ancestor Ezio Auditore da Firenze, in an attempt to learn about the ancient First Civilization race and end the Assassin-Templar discourse.

It’s easy to lose count of the Assassin’s Creed games that have followed since 2009, with the series delivering fan-favorites such as Revelations , Black Flag , and the open-world endeavor Origins . Following the latest franchise release in Assassin’s Creed Shadows , players are expecting the Claws of Awaji expansion to arrive at some point this year. However, a recent leak teased a new Assassin’s Creed game was possibly in the works, that’s not thought to be either of the previously announced titles, Jade and Hexe .

Posted on Reddit by OminousG, a screenshot of the Legendary Assassin’s statues from Assassin’s Creed 2 was shared on the game’s subreddit, and the user wondered what games could have transpired from this scene. Desmond left a lasting legacy in the Assassin’s Creed franchise, and fans haven’t forgiven Ubisoft for abandoning his storyline or failing to make Assassin’s Creed 3 follow Desmond in the modern day.

Assassin's Creed Fans Mourn the End of Desmond's Story

Desmond stepped down as protagonist in the Assassin’s Creed franchise to allow Ubisoft to structure the franchise as more of an anthology, but the gaming community still wonders what could have evolved from the modern-day plot line. Another Redditor noted in the thread that it felt like Ubisoft was afraid of risking such a large departure from the original formula, and therefore, decided to play it safe instead of what made sense narratively, which some believe “doomed the franchise.”

There’s plenty to look forward to in the Assassin’s Creed series, and previous theories teased Desmond could impact Hexe ’s narrative despite taking a backseat in the franchise. However, the community is still frustrated by how much the early games promised to impact future titles and the evolving story, and some fans agree that Ubisoft’s creative direction started to get old around Unity ’s release in 2014, noting that the more recent games are vastly different story and gameplay-wise from their beloved predecessors.

item.title: Roblox: Subway Mayhem Codes (August 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Subway Mayhem Codes
  • How to Redeem Subway Mayhem Codes
  • How to Get More Subway Mayhem Codes

Subway Mayhem is one of the representatives of the battlegrounds genre. Therefore, your main task will be to fight other players and throw them out of the arena. And to make battles easier for beginners, the developers add various codes to Subway Mayhem .

By redeeming codes, you will receive free goodies, among which are credits, which are the main currency in this Roblox experience. For this money, you can purchase various customization options, as well as weapons. But hurry because after a certain time, each code expires and the reward becomes no longer available.

Updated August 1, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: A new code has been added to Subway Mayhem , giving you even more Credits to claim. If you’ve already redeemed the others, this is a good opportunity to grab something fresh. The available rewards can give you a quick boost, especially if you're saving up. Make sure to keep an eye on this guide, as more codes may be released soon.

All Subway Mayhem Codes

Working Subway Mayhem Codes

  • PTSRELEASE - Redeem this code to get 1,000 Credits (NEW)
  • FREECASE - Redeem this code to get 1,500 Credits
  • DAILYREWARDS - Redeem this code to get 1,500 Credits

Expired Subway Mayhem Codes

There are no expired codes in Subway Mayhem . We will update this article as soon as more codes becomes available.

Like other representatives of the genre, Subway Mayhem offers you various maps on which you must fight to earn Credits. It is more difficult to do this than it seems, especially if your opponents are skilled players. Many attacks can stun you, which will allow others to either finish you off or throw you over the edge of the arena, so be prepared to spend a lot of time getting used to the combat system. Luckily, there is a way to slightly increase your survival chances, namely using Subway Mayhem codes.

These codes can contain various rewards, although most of them grant you money. For credits, you can buy weapons, such as grenades, to stun several opponents at once. However, we do not recommend delaying the use of Roblox codes, since their validity is limited.

How to Redeem Subway Mayhem Codes

To use Subway Mayhem codes, you only need to make a few clicks. This feature is no different from most other Roblox experiences. And for convenience, follow these steps:

  • First, launch Subway Mayhem .
  • Next, click on the tag icon. You will find it at the top of the screen, to the left of the AFK button.
  • After that, enter the code in the new window.
  • Finally, click the Check button to claim free goodies.

How to Get More Subway Mayhem Codes

To stay up to date with all active Subway Mayhem codes, you should bookmark this guide. We are going to update it over time, as well as our other Roblox articles. Alternatively, you can visit the official developer pages, where you will find all the news first-hand:

  • Daluest Studios Roblox group
  • Daluest Studios Discord server

How to Redeem Dragon Blox Codes

Just like other Roblox games, redeeming Dragon Blox codes is pretty easy. To do so, players just need to complete the five simple steps written below:

  1. Open Roblox and launch Dragon Blox .
  2. Open the menu on the left side of the screen.
  3. Click on the settings at the bottom.
  4. Press the “Redeem code” button and enter a code.
  5. After redeeming the code, a confirmation screen will appear.

Dragon Blox Tips and Tricks

Below, players can find tips and Tricks for Dragon Blox :

  • Understand the importance of power in the game, as it unlocks transformations.
  • Rebirthing is crucial and grants health, energy, power gain, and skill damage bonuses.
  • Use skill points to upgrade abilities for better performance.
  • Earn Silver Zenny through quests for purchasing vanity items.
  • Maximize power gain by strategically farming in different zones.
